short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sunrises will appear on the new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with Sunrise Backgrounds, a Chrome extension that brings the beauty of sunrise to every new tab! Each time you open a new tab, be greeted by a stunning, high-quality image of a sunrise from a different part of the world. Our collection of sunrise backgrounds showcases the natural beauty of early mornings, from serene beaches to majestic mountains, offering a moment of tranquility in your busy day.

By clicking "Add to chrome" I accept and agree to installing the Calm Start Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service, the Privacy Policy, and Terms of Use.
